FDG.function_description: Launch page for services and search

core_logic.logic: The flow starts on page 0 (launch page) with various service icons (e.g., FRVR Games, Booking.com, KKday, etc.). Clicking a service icon (like FRVR Games or Booking.com) navigates to page 4. From page 4, actions like clicking Home (back to page 0), Refresh/Search (to page 5), or Menu (to page 13) are possible. From page 5, Search or Menu actions lead to page 5 (leaf for Search) or page 13. From page 13, actions like Turbo mode, Block images, Settings, or Exit navigate back to page 4 or to page 20 (for Block images).

steps.summary: Click FRVR Games icon (page 0 to 4)
Click Booking.com icon (page 0 to 4)
Click Home button (page 4 to 0)
Click Refresh button (page 4 to 5)
Click Search button (page 4 to 5)
Click Menu button (page 4 to 13)
Click Search icon button (page 5, leaf)
Click Menu icon button (page 5 to 13)
Click Turbo mode button (page 13 to 4)
Click Block images button (page 13 to 20)
Click Settings button (page 13 to 4)
Click Exit button (page 13 to 4)
